pr_title: HDDS-4242. Copy PrefixInfo proto to new project hadoop-ozone/interface-storage

timeline.message: HDDS-4242. Copy PrefixInfo proto to new project hadoop-ozone/interface-storage

timeline.bodyText: Have to duplicate this class because the original one was used by different places. That's why I make this class package-private to make it only useable by codec classes.
timeline.author: amaliujia
timeline.diffHunk:

    + *
  • user:name:rw + *
  • group:name:rw + *
  • world::rw + *
+ */ +final class OzoneAclStorage {
